review: Doctor was friendly and listened to problems. Didnt suggest un-necessary medications, tests and treatments. Did the tests that was only necessary and suggested medicines only for SOS. Explained the treatments available for the condition but suggested to wait and first make the required lifestyle changes.

*** ** *** ****** *** * **** ***********. I had a risky pregnancy and she was the one, who has delivered a healthy child under her treatment. Then she was with Image Hospitals of Ameerpet and Madhapur.
